A roomy and friendly restaurant with a nice selection of tapas. There is a super-value €5,50 meal deal, which gets you 5 pxintos from the counter plus a drink (e.g. a glass of wine or can of soft drink). Also explore the menu as there are some great options there including the mushroom dishes.The staff a quite friendly too, and the ambience is very nice - a good blend of brick, wood and stone generates a rustic atmosphere that adds to the experience.There's free WiFi as well, so you can take advantage of any check-in offers that may be running...
